name: Sweet Pet Land Pop
description:
Sweet Pet Land Pop is an amazing match-3 puzzle game the insanely cute characters.
It's a super addictive and a great way to spend free time on holiday season.
FEATURES:
- FREE TO PLAY, ALL FREE
- Spectacular boosters
- Unique and exciting challenges as you explore this cute world
- Match more combos and super combos
- Moves are limited so plan them carefully
